objectives.title: CredentialMate: HIPAA Compliance & Security Hardening
objectives.description:
Ensure CredentialMate meets all HIPAA compliance requirements and security
best practices for handling Protected Health Information (PHI). This includes
audit logging, encryption, access controls, and compliance documentation.
success_criteria: All PHI data encrypted at rest and in transit
Comprehensive audit logging implemented
Role-based access controls (RBAC) enforced
HIPAA compliance documentation complete
Security penetration testing passed
Data breach notification procedures documented

objectives.title: AI Orchestrator: Autonomous Loop Optimization
objectives.description:
Optimize the autonomous loop to achieve 100+ tasks per session with minimal
human intervention. Focus on reducing retry rates, improving agent decision-making,
and enhancing the Knowledge Object system for better institutional memory.
success_criteria: Achieve 100+ tasks per session (currently 30-50)
Reduce retry budget usage by 30%
95%+ autonomous completion rate for L2 tasks
Knowledge Object consultation effectiveness >80%
Mission Control Phase C (CITO delegation) fully operational
Cross-repo memory continuity working seamlessly

objectives.title: KareMatch: Provider E2E Experience - Onboarding to Bookable
objectives.description:
Complete the end-to-end provider (therapist) journey from signup through being
bookable by patients. This is the critical path to marketplace launch - without
supply (providers), there is no marketplace.

Provider Journey:
1. Signup & account creation
2. Onboarding wizard (6 steps: Practice Info, About Me, Specialties, Credentials, Fees, Availability)
3. Credentialing wizard (10 steps: License, DEA, Board Cert, etc.)
4. Availability setup (weekly schedule)
5. Admin review & approval
6. Profile publication (profile_status='approved', searchable)
7. Patient discovery (search results)
8. Patient profile view
9. Patient booking flow

CRITICAL GAPS:
- Credentialing wizard steps 5-10 incomplete in Remix
- Profile publication logic MISSING (no code makes approved providers searchable)
- Admin approval workflow partial
- Patient booking flow needs completion
success_criteria: Provider can complete signup and create account
Provider can complete full 6-step onboarding wizard in Remix
Provider can complete full 10-step credentialing wizard
Provider can set weekly availability schedule
Admin can approve/reject providers with email notifications
Approved providers automatically become searchable (profile_status='approved')
Patients can search and filter approved providers only
Patients can view full provider profiles
Patients can book appointments with approved providers
E2E test validates full journey from signup to booking

objectives.title: KareMatch: Code Quality & Test Coverage
objectives.description:
Improve code quality across the KareMatch monorepo by addressing discovered
bugs, improving test coverage, and ensuring consistent code standards.
Focus on automated quality improvements that can be handled by QA Team agents.
success_criteria: All ESLint errors resolved
TypeScript strict mode enabled without errors
Test coverage >80% for critical paths
All discovered bugs from bug-discovery addressed
Vitest tests pass consistently

notes.description: Vibe Kanban board state for AI_Orchestrator
